Petit Rappel
2^1 = 2
2^2=4
2^3=8
2^=16

---192.168.1.0./24 -> 4 Subnets
2^n ->Subnets 2^2=4

Network  Host
192.168.1.0
24 : 1111 1111.1111 1111.1111 1111.0000 0000 
	255.	255.	255. 		0	





Subnets= Stealing
2^n-2 -> Hosts 2^3-2 = 6 hosts 


Network  Subnet Host
192.168.1.00    00 000 =192.168.10.0/26
192.168.1.01    00 000 =192.168.10.64/26
192.168.1.10   00 000 =192.168.10.128/26
192.168.1.11    00 000 =192.168.10.192/26

---

Network  Subnet Host
192.168.1.00    00 000 =192.168.10.0/26
192.168.1.01    00 000 =192.168.10.64/26
192.168.1.10   00 000 =192.168.10.128/26
192.168.1.11    00 000 =192.168.10.192/26
